scripts.build:webpack: mkdirp build && ncp src/index.html build/index.html && webpack -p
scripts.build:rollup: rm -rf build && mkdirp build/todomvc-common && ncp src/index.html build/index.html && rollup -c rollup.config.js && cp node_modules/todomvc-common/base.* build/todomvc-common/ && cp node_modules/todomvc-app-css/index.css build/todomvc.css
scripts.postbuild: uglifyjs build/app.js --pure-funcs classCallCheck Object.defineProperty Object.freeze invariant warning -c unsafe,collapse_vars,evaluate,screw_ie8,loops,keep_fargs=false,pure_getters,unused,dead_code -m -o build/app.js -p relative --in-source-map build/app.js.map --source-map build/app.js.map
